articles.description: Maharashtra Deputy Chief Minister, the BJP's Devendra Fadnavis, has strongly criticised the grand welcome given to the 11 men convicted for the rape of Bilkis Bano.
articles.content:
Devendra Fadnavis said, "An accused is an accused".

articles.title: Unnatural death registered after Sonali Phogat dies in Goa, autopsy to be conducted tomorrow
articles.description: Sonali Phogat passed away on Tuesday, August 23, in Goa. Anjuna Police has registered a case of unnatural death.
articles.content: Sonali Phogat breathed her last on August 23. Earlier, her sister had alleged a conspiracy as she said, Sonali felt uneasy after eating her food. Now, Anjuna Police has registered a case of unnatural… [+1519 chars]

articles.title: Indian air force sacks three officers for accidentally firing missile into Pakistan
articles.description: India previously blamed a ‘technical malfunction’ for accidental firing of unarmed missile in March
articles.content:
The Indian air force has said it has sacked three officers for accidentally firing a missile into Pakistan in March.

articles.title: Supreme Court says debate on ‘freebie’ issue important for country’s welfare
